page.title: 05CLAWTON CHURCH
page.content: There is some{evidence}that a church was already standing here in 1088.Of the original church little now remains.Some evidence is the{font} ,whichhas little pictures drawn on it.Also there is a little{window}with a Norman picture on it.Thereis a sun dial on the porch of the church,and it was made in 1734.The church was{ {rebuilt}inthe 14_15 century.There is some writing on the floor,it is where people have been buried. So far this year there has been{one} funeral and no weddings. The last weddingwas in{1979}. On Sundays about a {dozen}people go to services,at {Christmas}and{Easter} 15_20 people go.
